title: Share of ethnic minorities in the China 's minority autonomous regions 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of ethnic minorities for 21 number of Provinces.
The Share of ethnic minorities is highest at Province Tibet and lowest at Province Zhejiang.
There is a difference of 78.24 between the maximum Province Tibet and minimum Province Zhejiang.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of ethnic minorities for 21 number of Provinces.
The Share of ethnic minorities is appeared to be the highest at Province Tibet and lowest at Province Zhejiang.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of ethnic minorities for 21 number of Provinces.
The Share of ethnic minorities is highest at Province Tibet and lowest at Province Zhejiang.
There is a difference of 78.24 between the maximum Province Tibet and minimum Province Zhejiang.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Share of ethnic minorities in the y axis.
Province Tibet has the highest Share of ethnic minorities and Zhejiang has the lowest Share of ethnic minorities.
Province  has the second highest value for Share of ethnic minorities.
There is a difference of 78.24 between the maximum Province Tibet and minimum Province Zhejiang.
Share of ethnic minorities at Province Tibet is 90.05 , second place is  at 90.05, and thirdly is Chongqing at 74.39.
The highest value 90.05 at Tibet is almost 1.7 times larger than the average value 52.83.
Summing up the values of all Provinces, we get total 1109.41.
